name: Railway under the Moonlight
description:
Railway under the Moonlight is a short Visual Novel (2 222 words and two different endings) which talks about a desperate man who thinks about suicide. When he is about to act, someone whispering behind him catches him off. Was it a coincidence that he appeared at this moment ?

This game is available in French and English.

Made for the notGDCJam 2019 by Les Tisseurs, a friendly french team composed by :
- Faust for the story
- Vadex for the art
- Nighten for the code

DISCLAIMER :
This game talks about suicide and dark thoughts which can disrupt sensitive people.
